Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends certain provisions relating to an occupancy tax in the city of Port Jervis
Summary: Extends certain provisions relating to an occupancy tax for hotels and motels in the city of Port Jervis.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 368 of the laws of 2020, amending the tax law relating to allowing for the establishment of an occupancy tax in the city of Port Jervis, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
